name: 出发吧冒险家
description:
Support 1-2 people to take risks together (yes, you can go online with a small partner)



There are 120 basic treasures and 200 advanced treasures in the game. The effect is [infinite superposition]!

The effects that can be combined are endless, and each adventure is different



In addition to chopping and killing, you will encounter various NPCs on the road.

Businessmen, blacksmiths and the like are loved by everyone;

But the beggar who tries to test your love keeps asking you for money. Will you give it or not?

Rescued the beautiful princess from the boss. Are you holding her or releasing her to repay her kindness?

......

There are many NPCs with different personalities. If you have a bad temper, you can choose to rob directly without saying a word; However, if you are not strong, you may be killed on the spot



On the road, you can also plant fields, buy a stove for cooking, and build an arrow tower for fire output

In the end, the team you trained passed an adventure. Does rougelike mean that it's over?

no

Your team will [Guard] this adventure. Do other players dare to take risks? The last big boss is you!



---------------------------

The game can [watch the war] and [bullet screen chat]

You can also [play investment], invest in a team and watch the war. If he wins, you can pay dividends

There is also [self design adventure]. You design extremely difficult adventures, and other players can break through. They pay you [tickets], and if they pass the customs, you have to give them [bonus]; If you don't pass the customs, the [ticket] will fall into your pocket



This is a sincere and creative game. I hope you can be more patient and will bring you fun
